text: The 1982 Vuelta a España was the 37th edition of the Vuelta a España, one of cycling's Grand Tours. The Vuelta began in Santiago de Compostela, with a prologue individual time trial on 20 April, and Stage 9 occurred on 29 April with a stage to Puigcerdà. The race finished in Madrid on 9 May. ==Prologue== 20 April 1982 — Santiago de Compostela to Santiago de Compostela, (ITT) {| |Prologue result and general classification after Prologue {| class="wikitable" |- !
